title: Sauteed Brussels Sprouts
directions: In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high. Add brussels sprouts, season with salt and pepper, and cook, stirring frequently, until caramelized, 8 to 10 minutes. Add 1/3 cup water and cook until evaporated, about 2 minutes. Add lemon juice and toss to coat. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oilMonini Olive Oil Extra Virgin$9.99 thru 06/28
2 pints brussels sprouts (2 pounds total), trimmed and halved lengthwise
